New Records: Christian Eriksen tied his country's all-time record by making his 132nd international appearance
Key Match Events: Harry Kane scored his first goal of the tournament after 18 minutes
Morten Hjulmand equalized for Denmark with a superb shot from outside the area on 34 minutes
Foden hit the post with a left-foot effort from the edge of the area
Pre-Game Insights: England was expected to win based on its pre-tournament favoritism
Post-Match Reflections: The result raised further questions about Gareth Southgate's approach
Southgate has work to do to improve the team's performance
Denmark kept its hopes alive and could still win the group if it beats Serbia on Tuesday
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's position is far from a disaster
The team has similarities to its World Cup group in 2022
England's creative duo of Phil Foden and Jude Bellingham failed to connect with any kind of fluidity
